body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Builder and Optimizer
  • Attribute Weightings
    • Ability to edit custom attribute weightings.
  • Tax IDs
    • Ability to enter Tax IDs in group affiliation search field.
    • Tax ID is displayed on Provider Profile.
  • Search Criteria
    • Support multiple values for custom attributes.
    • Provider names on results page link to Provider Profile.
  • Search Results
    • Columns in results page are sortable.
    • Provider names on results page link to Provider Profile.
Confirmed Practicing
This feature requires additional provider data.
  • Competitive Dashboard
    • For projects with the appropriate data,
    • Confirmed counts and % are included in Market Penetration tabular data..
    • Confirmed indicators are included in Competitive Dashboard exports..
  • Compare Networks
    • For projects with the appropriate data,
    • User can choose do display only Confirmed Practicing providers.
    • Confirmed indicators are included in Compare Networks exports..
  • Details Results
    • For projects with the appropriate data,
    • Icons are displayed in the list if a provider is confirmed.
    • Confirmed indicators are included in Provider List exports..
  • Provider Profile
    • For projects with the appropriate data,
    • Icons is displayed next to provider name if confirmed.
    • Icons is displayed with provider location if confirmed.
    • Confirmed indicators are included in Provider Profile export..
Competitive Dashboard
  • Market Penetration
    • Added ability to exclude networks from the Market Penetration graph when Market Penetration is less than 10%.
    • For Medical projects, both Hospitals and Individual Provider must be below 10%.
    • For Dental projects, both Specialists and General Dentists must be below 10%.
